raw_body:
JURIANSZ RICHARD LLEWELLYN (DICKIE),​ beloved husband of Annabelle,​ loving father of Zarah & Fiona,​ loving son of late Captain Llew & late Rhoda Juriansz,​ beloved brother of Johan & late Leone,​ beloved father-in-law of Eraj & Hasrath and darling grandfather of Tejan & Mehara. Remains lie at A.F. Raymonds Parlour,​ Borella. Service will be on the 31st January (Wednesday) at 4.15 pm and cortege leaves parlour at 5.00 pm. Burial will be at the Christian section of the General Cemetary Borella at 5.30 pm.
006925
